name: Purplepower
tagline: Purple Power - For All Your Purple Needs
body:
Welcome To JNuts' Mod Page for Purple Power
Purple Power is a mod in development. It's main concept is solar panels, purple ore, purple tools, and more to come!
Feel free to leave suggestions!

Download Links Coming Soon ™  
Feel free to look through my GitHub repo!

Here's how you download
```
Goto the folder that you want the Purple Power folder in
Shift right click (Windows) chose open command window here and enter this

$ <C:\users\your_name\your_folder> git clone https://github.com/J-Nutz/PurplePower.git

Wait for it to download, then point your IDE to that path!

```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
